text:
e="preserve">Avatar Korra is the title lead character in Nickelodeon's animated television series "The Legend of Korra" (a sequel to '). She is the current incarnation of Raava's Avatar and Avatar Aang.
The character was created by Michael Dante DiMartino and Bryan Konietzko and is voiced by Janet Varney.
The series' final scene, indicating the beginning of a romantic relationship between Korra and Asami Sato. This was rare in its LGBT representation in western children's television.
